text:
Hi Abhaaaaa!!

You are one of the sweetest and most humble people I know. I am glad that in whatever time we got, we became good friends with each other. The CTM selection period, orientation sessions, Hakuna Matata, all were fun and awesome when you were there. Coordies ko mana kar treat lene ka bhi apna hi maza that yaar us time. It would have been great agar hume thoda aur time mila hota interact karne ka. 

All the best for your journey. Humehsa aisi hi sweet, kind, humble and helping person rehna yaar. I really cherish you for that. Hum bahut jald milenge wapas. Tab tak ke liye take care and please stay in touch <3<3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yadav Sir!!

Apna main interaction bhi PUBG ne hi shuru karwaya tha yaar. Uske baad fir MSO201 aaya, apni sabki achche se baja kar gaya wo course. Still yaad hai uska wo objective endsem, negative marking ke karan sab roye the marks aane ke baad xD

Nonetheless, a special mention goes to our last stay in campus, mene kaafi bond kiya tere saath. Thank you yaar for all that advice in Samu's room during quarantine and afterwards as well. Wo advices kaafi help kar gayi. Those among us nights, endless bullas, carrying out the rescue operations after people getting stoned, sab ke sab kaafi mazedaar the :P. Us stay mein I got to know your other side as well ki kitna emotional bhi hai tu, bas duniya ko khulke dikhata nahi. Really glad that we bonded. And aage Bangalore to hai hi apne saath.

Situation normal hote hi wapas se trip plan karte hain, tere saath ek bhi trip nahi ho paayi meri. Aur aage Bangalore mein aur bhi jyada enjoy karenge, plans ready rakhna :P

Until next time then, dhyaan rakhna apna, touch mein to rahenge hi apan, explicitly nahi bolunga :P. Milte hain wapas se bahut jald.

PS: Thank you for convincing me for Hall Photoshoot, warna mein definitely regret karta baad mein.

ऐश के यार तो अग़्यार भी बन जाते हैं 
दोस्त वो हैं जो बुरे वक़्त में काम आते हैं
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Hi Aditya!

You are one of the most sincere guys in our wing. First-year mein TA101 see lekar PHY101, kaafi jagah tumhari advice helpful rahi thi. Thank you for that. I hope batti department mein aakar kaafi maza aa raha hoga xD. Kabhi bhi meri jarurat lage to yaad karna. Hopefully, milenge jaldi hi. Untill then take care and stay in touch.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Akshat boii!!

Jab bhi koi mujhse puchega ki name the most all-round person you know, undoubtedly tera naam hi sabse pehle aayega mere dimaag mein. Kaise chaap leta hai yaar har jagah itna. Spill the secret please :P

Beginning your IITK journey from a chubby moustache guy (:P) and evolving towards a smarter, wittier and one of the fittest guys in the wing, we all have had our moments together. You are one of the most mature persons I have ever met, and your dedication and hardworking has always been on a different level. I firmly believe ki tu bahut aage jaayega life mein and will do something big <3

I can’t thank you enough for all the calls and texts you did to me when I needed them the most. You provided me support I can rely on when I was searching for one. Humesha aise hi kind-hearted and happiness spreading insaan rehna. This world needs a lot more people like you :P

If I start counting the times jab humne saath mein kaafi maze kiye, list finite nahi reh paayegi xD. Still,

Cheers
To all the fun times
To all the parties
To all the infinitely long bulla sessions
To all the football and volleyball matches
To all Among Us nights during quarantine
To all the times not mentioned above
To us

Hum to milenge hi jald Bangalore mein wapas, tab tak ke liye take care and all the very best for your future <3<3. Apni wing ki trip pending hai, wo bhi karte hain bahut jald plan, aise give-up nahi karenge xD. Untill next time then, Mr AA07!!

PS: Us list mein to abhi bahut si cheezein add honi baaki hain, Bangalore pahuch kar wo sab add karenge xD
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Arzooooo (and Rzu and ZuZuu)! Kitne naam hain yaar tere bro xD

To kahan se shuru karun, saare kisse likhne baith gaya to words aur space dono kam padd jaayegi xD

Okay, so let's start from the summer of 2019. Spending the entire day in the office without doing anything significant, getting stuck in never-ending bulla sessions, waking up at 1 PM on weekends in the office, and whatnot. I can't remember even the smallest duration of that summer, which was not fun with you being there <3

Dil se thank you yaar for all the support you provided me. I remember ranting in front of you, getting all disappointed and ready to give up after I got rejected by those companies I had prepared and worked hard for. You lifted me up in those times and kept my strength intact. And you kept doing the same countless other times as well, including the frustrating second week of my internship :P

Arzoo, you're the strongest person I know. In this last one and a half year, you have seen a lot of ups and downs, but you were always there, always available if anyone needed your help or your presence. The way you keep your cool in difficult situations and then give your best to come out of them, I really envy you for that. You have worked very hard to reach where you are today, and you truly deserve it <3

Understanding you would have been the most difficult thing I have ever done. And I can proudly say that I did succeed to some extent in this regard :P. I am very grateful that we became such good friends. Tu bahut down to earth person hai yaar, and you were always there to listen to me without judging, whenever I needed you. Also, I won't ever forget the humorous responses you used to provide even in serious situations because, surprisingly, they did cheer me up a lot of times :P. Everyone knows your sassy and badass side, and it has been mentioned in your other memoirs as well, but here I am with the totally different aspect of Arzoo jo shayad jyada logon ne perceive nahi kiya hoga :P

All the best for all your future endeavours. Always stay the kind, bold, and fearless person you originally are and have a great life ahead. Be happy humesha and keep spreading the smiles around you. Numerous bets were won and lost, and a lot of debt is yet to be paid. Isliye jaldi hi milenge saara hisaab chukane ke liye. Cheers to all the bad times and, more importantly, the fun and the good times we spent beside each other <3

Until next time. Take care and lots of love, best friend <3<3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yoooo Digudaa!!

Okay, here we are now!! Ending one phase of our companionship before commencing another one. And here I am with my words (although these would never be sufficient) describing our friendship.

Itne sweet, humble, cheerful aur wholesome insaan kaise ho yaar tum, mujhe bhi sikha do thoda please so that I might come out as less formal and less straight-forward with the people I meet for the first time.

मैं अकेला ही चला था जानिब-ए-मंज़िल मगर 
लोग साथ आते गए और कारवाँ बनता गया

Is karwaan ka sabse pehla kafir tu hi hai bro. I still remember the day I texted you and you called me back to hear me rant out. You are the person who taught me the importance of self-care, and I will forever be grateful to you for that. You had to bear a lot of shitty arguments of mine, pata nahi sorry bolun ya thank you. Better leave it to you, jo better lage wo rakh lena, jo na lage wo bhi rakh hi lena :P. Those evening walks and philosophical (and maybe moral and ethical) discussions with you and Dipuk in our last stay are the ones that I will always cherish and remember.

If I remember our first interaction, it was probably on the day we became CTMs. You were an introverted, calm, sweet, humble and this awesome guy when we first met. Over the span of two years, I have seen you evolve, and the best thing about you is that you kept all of your good aspects intact within you, you didn’t change even a bit in that regard. 

Summer of 2019 kitna mast tha na yaar, we used to just sit around and gossip in the office the whole day. I wish we got more time to be in each other’s proximity in our Coordie tenure as well. All those long meetings, interviews, sessions, might have been frustrating at that time but are now a happy nostalgia. Also, please maaf kar dena jab bhi mene tujhe kuch bol diya ho kaam ke pressure mein aake, you know that ki mene mean karke to bilkul nahi bola hoga. And agar nahi karna hai maaf to bhi koi na, next time milunga tab aur achche se gaaliya dunga xD

I know mein Goa trip par nahi aa paaya tha, bas uski bharpaayi hogi, barabar hogi. Situation normal hote hi worcation plan karte hain. And planning ki responsibility meri :P

Kitna bhi likh dun, wo kam hi hoga tujhe and humari journey ko describe karne ke liye. Isliye aur trivial baatein naa likh kar end kar deta hun. Baaki to tujhe pata hi hai dil se kitni gaaliyan (ya maybe blessings ;) ) deta tujhe.

All the best to bolunga hi, ritual jo hai, so All the best for all your future endeavours. Bahur jald wapas milenge and aur bhi jyada enjoy karenge. Waise bhi tu kahan hi jaa raha hai, apna to Oracle se lekar Bangalore tak ka saath hai. A lot more years filled with fun are yet to come. Stay in touch nahi bolunga kyunki wo to tu rahega hi, and agar contact chhuta to fir to you know me, ki mein kya karunga tere saath :P

Until next time then. Take Care and lots of love <3<3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yohooo Priyalllll! My cute, wholesome, and lovely date <3
First of all, you will always be my perfect first date, even after you find someone else for me :P
Yaar I miss those days in summer jab hum poora din CS Office mein nikal diya karte the. Every Tuesday evening you used to say, ‘Chalo na guys aaj party karte hain, kal meri ECO101 ki class nahi hai’. I will never forget this. And ‘Maneer Panchurian’, wo bhi kabhi nahi :P 
I too want to spend a lot more time with you. Jaldi hi ek achchi si trip plan karte hain, and yeah, I will not step back this time, pakka aaunga hi and trip leader bhi mein hi rahunga :P
I have always seen you spreading cheerful smiles and happiness to the people around you. How do you manage to do that every single time yaar, even in the difficult times as well? You are one of the strongest people I know, and I mean it. Humesha aisi hi cheerful, happy and khushiyan spread karne wali dost hi rehna yaar. I am very grateful to have a wonderful and awesome friend like you by my side. Love you a lot Priyal <3
Also, I am not gonna improve my storytelling skills jab tak tu khud mujhe train nahi kar deti. Tab tak ke liye I will leave you with something to tease me :P
All the best for your journey Priyal, bahut jaldi milenge hum, and tab tak apna dhyaan rakhna mat bhoolna 
Lots of love <3 <3 <3 
Your Lovely Date :P,
TanTan
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Dear Prof. Pal!

The most focused person that I have ever met is you. Kaafi hardworking and talented person hai tu and your outputs clearly show it. Again Congratulations on being selected as a PhD scholar at MIT. I believe you will do great things in your life, and you have already started to show us some glimpses as well :P
The photoshoot and then getting caught in OAT was fun xD. 

All the best for your future. Hopefully, kabhi na kabhi to milna ho hi jaayega humara. Take Care.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Mishra Ji!!

It was a pleasure working with you in the Hall 5 CS Core Team. Decorating the CS office with you was very fun. Hope hume ek saal aur mila hota, we could have enjoyed more. Keep up the hard work and dedication you have been showing till now. Hopefully, milte hain jaldi hi. All the best for your journey <3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Birju!!

The biggest Real Madrid fan I have ever encountered with. Also, one of the biggest Witcher fans too. Thank you for introducing me to the ultimate game series. Bahut maza aaya yaar dono games khel kar. Web series to shaandar this hi, now waiting for season 2 to arrive and then kuch aur questions lekar aajaunga table par there liye. Also, thank you zealevince se introduce karwane ke liye bhi, kaafi useful site hai :P

It was unfortunate ki tu wapas campus nahi aa paaya second wave ke karan, humne aur jyada football khela hota saath mein, but nonetheless, it was pleasure playing with you all those matches, extensively discussing the leagues, the AC franchise and especially the witcher franchise. 

All the best for your journey and jaldi milenge wapas. Take care.

PS: Predictions for Spain in Euros :P?
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Dhamaka

The host of the Gaming Room of D-Mid.

It was my good fortune to have you as my neighbour. All those discussions in ESC201, ESO208, and even on various random topics as well very helpful and fun. Tere saath PUBG duo khelne mein bahut maza aata the yaar, we eventually became pro duo players. 

You are one of the smartest and most intelligent people I have met. I believe you will perform excellently in all your future endeavours. Hopefully, milte hain jaldi hi. Untill then, take care and stay in touch.

PS: I hope Germany don't get humiliated in Group F, I know it will be difficult for you to watch the group exit again :P
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Hi Gourav!

I am glad ki is baar last stay mein tujhse kaafi interact karne ko mila. Kurta photoshoot mein kaafi maza aaya tha yaar. And thank you for that Kathi Rolls treat.

Tu kaafi dedication and sincerity wala banda hai yaar, us din jab tera mock liya tha, tujhse kaafi strong feeling aayi thi ki tu agle din HSBC ka interview chaap dega and exactly waise hi hua. Kaafi khushi mili thi agle din tera result jaan kar. Aise hi hard work karte rehna yaar, there are a lot of miles ye to  go and tu thakne wale logon mein se nahi.

All the very best for your future. Milenge jaldi hi wapas se. Take care.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Oye Paaji!!

Bhopal tak ke mere saathi! Us din tune papa ko bolke meri Shujalpur tak ki ticket na karwayi hoti to mujhe kaafi dikkat aayi hoti yaar, thank you uske liye! 

Bahut jolly insaan hai yaar tu, bas thodi tension kam liya kar, sab changa hoga life mein. Kaafi hardworking and dedicating insaan hai yaar tu. Keep up the spirit, kaafi aaage jaayega life mein, I believe. Baaki to Bangalore mein milte rahenge hum, parties bhi karenge. Also, getting caught in OAT was fun yaar, badi fati thi us din and fir maza bhi kaafi aaya tha xD

All the best for your future. Milte hain jaldi hi wapas fir. Take Care.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Kemchho Verma Ji!!

Jyada trivial stuff nahi likhunga kyunki tune sahi bola ki itne chhote se box mein poori chaar saal ki memories sametna is not possible. 

Par fir bhi itna kahunga ki you are the best example of changes that a person can bring in their life to overcome all the difficulties in their way. Your evolution from Harshit 1.0 to Verma 2.0 has been spectacular. Not only this, journey from a noob Kar98K to a pro KreeKnight, kya hi batayein iske baare mein ab to. Tere jitna dedication and hardworking nature bahut kam logon mein hota hai. Keep up the spirit, I believe tu bahut aage tak jaayega. Hopefully, jaldi hi hume Dr Harshit Verma se milne ka saubhagya prapt hoga.  

Ladakh trip plan karte hain yaar situation improve hote hi, abhi tak trip par jaa hi nahi paaya yaar tere saath, ab to pakka jaana hi hai. Milte hain bahut jald. Dhyaan rakhiyega tab tak apna <3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Dipukkkk mere bhaiiiii! Kya hi baat karun yaar ab teri to! Shabd kam padd jaayenge teri tareef mein!
I still remember jab hum paanchon Antaragni mein ghuma karte the saath mein. That was the first time I got to interact with you properly. Tab se ab tak it has always been fun working with you yaar, bhale hi wo last year CTM selection ke time GD par same side rehkar ladna ho ya is saal saath mein baithkar logon ke inbox certificates se spam karna ho.
Tera jitna shukriya karun utna kam hai. Jab bhi mein cheezon ko lekar overthink kar raha hota tha and kisi na kisi dilemma mein fasa hota tha, tu tha mujhe sunne ke liye and your advice always helped me get a clear perspective. You kept my strength intact. I hope tujhse regular conversations mene thodi pehle start kar di hoti, things would have been easier. But it’s fine, yahan mein assume kar leta hun ki, ‘Whatever happens, happens for good’ :P 
Sach bataun to tujhse baat karta hun to lagta hai ki I am texting myself, and that self is bit more sorted, grown, and mature than what I am currently. And I am looking forward to attaining that self soon :P
Sorry yaar, mene trip miss kar di thi (and some parties too :P), but bharpaayi kar dunga jaldi hi. Bahut jald fir se milenge and will plan a trip soon with y’all (aur wo trip to mein hi lead karunga :P).
Saari ghazals, kavityein, aur sher bhejne ke liye bahut bahut shukriya. Itne achche content se rubaroo kara diya tune. And how can I forget ‘philosophize this’. Jald hi aur deep philosophical discussions bhi start kar dunga tere saath :P. Also Helicopter building was so fun, enjoyed roaming around a lot that night yaar <3
All the best for your future endeavours and atake care until we meet again!!
Lots of love!! <3<3 
PS: Innocent to undoubtedly mein hi jyaada hun, sawal hi nahi uthta discussion ka yahan to :P
PPS: Wholesome Warning! A lot of spam incoming!
author: Tanishq  Patil

na jaane kis galī meñ zindagī kī shaam ho jaa.e
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
उजाले अपनी यादों के हमारे साथ रहने दो

author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
मैं अकेला ही चला था जानिब-ए-मंज़िल मगर 

लोग साथ आते गए और कारवाँ बनता गया
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yoo Ramjii!!

Kaafi mast insaan hai yaar tu. Bahut hi humble, sweet and cheerful. Teri saman jugaadne ki skills to gawd level hain bhai, unka koi copmarison nahi. Thank you us din blazer jugaadne ke liye. Tera room room nahi Doraemon ki pocket hai, har zarurat ka saaman hota tha humehsa tere paas. Ye wala campus stay kaafi enjoy kiya yaar tere saath, quarantine mein Among Us mein kafi maza aaya. And tu us time daily ka menu bata diya karta tha, kaafi talented hai yaar tu.

Tere saath kabhi music play karne ke mauka nahi mila but hopefully jab next time milenge tab tera guitar tere saath hoga and mera mere saath and hum saath mein play karenge, jam karenge sab milkar. You are a pro in music, humesha aise hi mehnat karte rehna and stay the same person you are. I cherish you for that.

All the best for your journey. Jaldi hi milenge wapas. Tab tak take care.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Lammboraa!!

From being roommates and सोऽहम् partners in the first year to being the neighbours in the third year, it has been a very enriching journey. The sincerity, discipline, dedication, and hard work that you show towards your tasks are very admirable. Keep up this spirit of yours and December mein placements mein undoubtedly chaap dega tu. 

Tere saath life ke philosophical discussions karne mein bahut maza aata tha yaar. Hopefully firse karne milenge hume wo discussions. Thank you for all the gajar paak and ladoos that you used to bring for us, will always remember them and mauka lagte hi firse tapak jaayenge tere paas wo khaane ke liye.

Trip plan karte hain yaar jaldi hi, tere saath ek bhi trip karne ka mauka nahi mila mujhe. Fir wahan baith kar aaram se philosophies discuss karenge.

All the best for your journey!! Chaap dena dual wale year mein and kabhi bhi jarurat lage humari, yaad karna, aapki sewa mein haazir ho jaayenge. Untill next time, take care. Stay healthy, fit, happy and safe<3<3. Also, keep running because there are yet many miles to go :P
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Sagnik urf Shaggy (or should I call Saggy? xD) mere dost!!

Tere bina kaise Ops team mein kaam karne ka maza kaise aata yaar, teri punch lines abhi bhi dimaag mein ghumti hain. Sirf ye hi nahi, I remember you humming the verses of Symphony and a Bengali song (sorry can’t remember its name :P) each and every day in the summer :P

Thank you for all the help you provided during intern prep, and also in EE320 as well, wo last chapter teri help ke bina samajh nahi aata yaar, bacha liya tha tune us din <3

Repeating your sentence, trivial cheezein nahi likhunga kyunki hum mutual understanding se utna to samajh jaayenge. Still itna bolunga ki you are one of the most dedicated people I know, and I have seen you working very hard to achieve your goals and I have learnt a lot from you. I strongly believe ki tu bahut aage jaayega. Bas aise hi laga reh <3

Agar kaam ke pressure mein kabhi tujhe jyada bol diya ho to dil se sorry, maaf kar dena yaar, bilkul bhi mean karke nahi bola hoga mene tab. Working one whole year with you was a pure blessing. And yeah, hum bahut jaldi wapas milenge and kaafi achchi party karenge (all expenditure on you obviously :P). Tab tak take care, love you and all the best for your future endeavours dost <3<3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yoo Samuuu!! Bhai bhai <3

Kahan se shuru kiya jaaye aur kahan khatma kiya jaaye, sirf shabd kaafi nahi hain apni chaar saal ki story sunane ke liye

Kitni saari treats aur parties kari hongi hum sabne saath mein, unka koi count hi nahi, Hall 4 se lekar BBQ and Landmark, kaafi saari jagah ghume hain. Cheers to all the fun times (and some sad as well) we had spent together. And special cheers to your Mocha Café treat :P

COM200 humesha yaad rahega, hum sab saanth mein jaaya karte the aur tune aur Amru ne OTP building ka naamkaran kar diya tha xDD. Abhi bhi hasi aa jaati hai us par. Tu humesha se hi mera go to person raha hai, kuch bhi kissa ho, sabse pehle tere saamne hi ugalta tha xDD. CS ke secrets, mere kaand, bahut saari cheezein batayi hai tujhe and tu humesha se samjhta bhi aaya hai mujhe. I have always enjoyed your company because you were always a delight to be around.

Tu mujhe humesha se apna Taarak Mehta bolta aaya hai par samajh nahi aata kaafi baar ki Jhethalal tu hai ki mein hun xD. More accurately bolun to roles kaafi had tak interchangeable rahe hain xD.

Do baar ki trip cancel hui hai meri tere saath, Rajasthan wali mein tune bola bhi tha par aa nahi paaya tha. Par is baar pakka chalenge, is baar koi excuse nahi, situation normal hote hi worcation plan hain sab saath mein.

Also, wish karunga teri location Bangalore aajaye, sab saath mein maze karenge, akele akele Mumbai mein bor ho jaayega :P. Kaafi baar wing ko miss karta yaar, apne bulla sessions ko miss kaarta. Bahut jaldi hi milenge wapas, and kaafi enjoy karenge saath mein.

All the best for your journey. Humesha aise hi simple, kind, cheerful, energetic, strong and happy insaan rehna yaar. Mein kaafi value karta yaar teri, kabhi bhi kuch bhi jarurat pade to mein to hun hi humesha yahan tera Taarak banke :P. Take care and love you yaar <3<3<3

PS: Next time milenge tab duet perform karenge guitar par, tu lead lena mein chords play karunga :P
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Sandy Bhaiya! Bihari Bhaiya!

D-Mid ka football coach!!
 
Kitna mast insaan hai yaar tu. Tere jaise free spirited person nahi dekha yaar abhi tak. Tension ke mahaul mein bhi mast maula rehta hai tu. Us raat Verma ke liye tera panic call kaafi wholesome gesture thaa yaar. Pehle utna interact karne ka mauka nahi mila yaar par end mein humne achcha bond kiya.

Football to itna achcha khelte hi ho yaar, midfield se game banana koi tujhse seekhe. Skating mein bhi mahir ho, ye nahi pata tha ki basketball mein chaapu ho. Ek aur naya talent jaanne mil gaya tera. Maza aaya kaafi tere saath especially us last campus stay mein, khoob enjoy kiya humne and hume OAT mein pakad mein aate bhi dekh liya us din tumne. Bach gaye the us din tum. Maza aaya tha kaafi although fati bhi utni hi thi xD

All the best for your journey yaar. Hopefully jaldi milte hain wapas, dhyaan rakhiyega apna.
#Always D-Mid
#Always Hall 5
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Patil bhauuu!!!

Kitna zyada mast insaan hai yaar tu. Always laughing, spreading smiles, rarely kabhi tujhe serious mode mein dekha hoga yaar.

Very very thank you yaar mujhe AC franchise and Witcher franchise se introduce karwane ke liye. Bahut hi achche suggestions the yaar tere and tere saath wo sab discuss karne mein bhi bahut maza aaya. Also discussing football with you was always fun, hopefully, Barca thoda better kare is saal :P. 

CGS601 saath mein achche see nikal liya humne, tu an hota to pakka band bajti endsem mein :P. Also, kaafi dedicated insaan hai yaar tu, itna regularity par squash khelna and fitness maintain karna is not easy. Keep up the hard work.

All the best for your jorney.Hopefully, jaldi milenge wapas. Take Care.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Jagga Sir,

Pehle formality kar leta hun, 'A hearty welcome to the D-Mid wing!!'

You are the most humble person I met in campus. Itne sincere and dedicated person kaise ho yaar xD

Door to door conversations with you for a whole year were always fun. OAT photoshoot, getting evicted, and nearly avoiding SSAC was quite an adventure. I am glad ki tu humari wing mein aaya and we got the chance to become good friends. Milte hain yaar jaldi hi, tab tak take care and stay in touch <3
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Singhshu urf Dhaule :P

Mere first year ke padosi, first year ke baad to bahut door door rooms le liye yaar tune. Still is baar last stay mein enjoy karne mein fark nahi pada uska :P. Party mein kaafi enjoy kiya tere saath. Bahut neat chadhayi thi tune din :P. Aur tere slow-motion ka to har wing ka member kayal hai. Kaise kar lete ho yaar ye, kya secret chhupaye ho, hume bhi batao xD.

Coding ka to tu chaapu hai hi, GSoC karli second year mein, fir samsung mein intern, ab Zomato mein job. Kitna kamaya hai saale tune pichle do saalon mein, par treat na di ek bhi. Koi na, pending rahi, next time milenge tab lunga hi saale tujhse treat. Trip plan karte hain jaldi hi, aa hi jana, campus wale har din ki tarah rr mat karna is baar. Milte hain jaldi wapas, enjoy karenge sab saath mil kar. Tab tak take care and stay in touch.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Take 2:

Is baar trip to hokar hi rahegi xD
Sherlock ki ringtone ka idea dene ke liye shukriya, 3.5 saal tak wahi thi mere phone mein, all thanks to you :P 
TA202, BSE656, and CGS601 mein kaafi maza aaya yaar tere saath, kuch na kuch fun and interesting hota hi rehta tha (waise BSE656 mein to tu bada khush hua hoga, I know :P)
Also, HR ka idea bura nahi, try kar sakte future mein :P

And All the best for your journey. I believe ki tu bahut aage jaayega, bharosa hai tujh par kaafi. Zomato ke coupons bhejte rehna yaar, Bangalore mein udata rahunga mein :P

PS: Keep up your photography hobby, saste photographer se bade photographer banne mein der nahi lagegi :P
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Sohail Bhai!!

I remember we started playing PUBG together in the 3rd semester. Kaafi mazedaar waqt tha yaar wo.

And how can I forget these last 50 days of our stay on campus yaar. Quarantine would have been very boring without you. That video shoot we did on the OAT roof, playing poker in your room, OAT photoshoot, getting evicted, nearly escaping SSAC, and then Samu ke room mein baith kar sabka tension se much utar jaana, bahut kisse hain yaar raise, jitne ginaun utne kam hain. Dominos se kaafi pizzas order kiye humne saath mein, and Verma ke room mein baithkar matches bhi dekhe kaafi. Kaafi enjot kiya yaar mene teri company mein.

Bahut humble insaan hai yaar tu. Always stay the same. All the best for your journey and hopefully jaldi hi trip plan karke sab milte hain wapas se. Tab take take care and stay in touch!
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Yo Vakul!

Working with you in various lab courses was amazing yaar. You always brought brilliant ideas to the table. Humne shayad TA201, TA202 and ESO203 lab ki thi saath mein. Hopefully future mein milna hoga hi humara. I believe you will do great things in your life. All the best for your journey.
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Vikram, mere bhaiii!!

Aaj bhi yaad hai wo din jab tu Antaragni mein Poker competetion jeet kar aaya tha and mene tera number apne phone mein 'Juari' naam se save kiya, and it is still the same xD

Tu wing ka sabse happening and energetic insaan hai yaar. Tere loop mein gaane chalte the and wo sunkar mein bhi search karke wo sunna start kar deta tha xD. Thank you for all the wifi your D-Link provided us in the F-Block. Also, thank you for all the free snacks jo tu khushi khushi baant deta tha.

IITK ki is last visit mein tere bina maza nahi aata yaar. Wo party arrange karwane ke liye shukriya, kaafi maza aaya the usme. It has always been fun to have you around. Baaki aise hi regular rehna aur mehnat karte rehna, placements mein chaap dega tu, mujhe bharosa hai.

Apni temporarily cancelled trip of Ladakh plan karte hain yaar jaldi hi. Tere saath trip par jaana hai yaar, abhi tak mauka hi nahi mila. Tab tak take care, stay safe and stay in touch!! Aag lagayenge next trip par!!
author: Tanishq  Patil

text:
Hiiii Yashikaaaa!!!!

Will start by thanking you for the card you gave me that day. It was one of the sweetest and most wholesome things anyone has ever done for me. The message you wrote inside was very heart-warming. You almost had me in tears that evening. It meant a lot. Thank you again <3<3

I didn’t get to know you much initially but roaming around in Antaragni with you was veryyy fun. All that mocking and daring we five used to do around, I will always remember it. That was the time when we started bonding. 

Working beside you as a CS Coordinator was pure bliss for me. This tenure definitely made us better friends and improved our bond. It was my pleasure (and honour as well :P) working with you as your fellow Coordie. I wish we could have gotten more time to work with each other on the campus itself.

You are one of the most sincere, kind, and wholesome people I know. Always stay the same, a lot of people (including me :) ) cherish you for that <3. We will soon meet again. I will be in Bengaluru, and I might drop off to Mangalore and ask you for a tour, so please be prepared for that :P. Also, our Coordie trip is pending, so let’s plan it as soon as the situation returns to normalcy.

All the very best for your journey!! Take care and lots of love <3<3<3
author: Tanishq  Patil
